title: Data Import & Export
subject: Data Science
theory: Pandas supports robust IO tools. `read_csv` is the most common, with parameters to handle separators, missing values, and headers.

examples.explanation: Automatically parses the 'Date' column into datetime objects.

common_mistakes.correction: Default `to_csv` saves the row numbers as a column. Usually, you want `index=False`.

real_world_use_cases.description: Reading from a database (read_sql) and saving to a Parquet file (to_parquet) for big data efficiency.

summary: Getting data in and out of Python is the bridge between analysis and the real world.
